Add video form with category selection and YouTube parsing

videos.title: Featured YouTube Edit
videos.description: Featured YouTube edit from your playlist.

usage_notes: On first run, the admin panel seeds the categories collection with the same categories used on the public portfolio: Reels Edit, YouTube Edit, Ads Edit, 3D Model Integration, 3D Layers Edit, Cinematography.
To add more categories later, use the Categories section inside the admin dashboard. These populate the category dropdown on the Add Video form.
Videos are stored in Firestore collection 'videos' with fields: youtube_id, title, description, category, created_at.
Categories are stored in collection 'categories' with fields: name, order.
If the Add Video category dropdown is empty, ensure Firestore rules allow read/write for authenticated admins.
